remarks: Lemma for ~ paddass .  The case when ` r .<_ ( x .\/ y ) ` .  (Unlike the proof in Maeda and Maeda, we don't need ` x =/= y ` .)  (Contributed by NM, 11-Jan-2012.)
statement:
paddasslem.l $e |- .<_ = ( le ` K ) $.
paddasslem.j $e |- .\/ = ( join ` K ) $.
paddasslem.a $e |- A = ( Atoms ` K ) $.
paddasslem.p $e |- .+ = ( +P ` K ) $.
paddasslem13 $p |- ( ( ( ( K e. HL /\ p =/= z ) /\ ( X C_ A /\ Y C_ A /\ Z C_ A ) /\ ( p e. A /\ r e. A ) ) /\ ( ( x e. X /\ y e. Y ) /\ ( r .<_ ( x .\/ y ) /\ p .<_ ( x .\/ r ) ) ) ) -> p e. ( ( X .+ Y ) .+ Z ) ) $.
